vclaim: The U.S. women's soccer team turned their backs to protest against a 98-year-old veteran who performed the National Anthem before the team's match against Mexico.
title: Did US Women’s Soccer Team Turn Backs on Vet Playing National Anthem?
subtitle: Several members of the U.S. women soccer team signed a ball for the 98-year-old veteran after the match.
author: Dan Evon
